actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 107-817.

official_title: A bill to provide for the sale of certain real property in the Newlands Project, Nevada, to the city of Fallon, Nevada.
short_title: Fallon Rail Freight Loading Facility Transfer Act

summary.text: Fallon Rail Freight Loading Facility Transfer Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain real property within the Newlands Reclamation Project, Nevada, generally known as "380 North Taylor Street, Fallon, Nevada," to the city of Fallon for its fair market value, without taking into consideration the value of any structures or improvements.Prohibits such conveyance from occurring until the Commissioner certifies that all liability issues relating to such property have been resolved.

titles.title: Fallon Rail Freight Loading Facility Transfer Act
A bill to provide for the sale of certain real property in the Newlands Project, Nevada, to the city of Fallon, Nevada.
